channel.title: Mapbox on Ethan Nelson - Data Reporter
channel.description: Recent content in Mapbox on Ethan Nelson - Data Reporter

item.title: Explore Voyageur Canoe Routes
item.description: I made a Mapbox map using data from the Centre de Patrimonie, an organization dedicated to preserving Manitoba’s francophone history. The Centre has collected a large database of voyageur contracts signed in Montreal between 1714 and 1830. Click here or on the image below to explore who the voyageurs were, where they went, and what they did.

item.title: Chicago Traffic Crash Map
item.description: A map of traffic crashes in Chicago, according to time of day and estimated cost of damage. This make use of a combination of d3.js and Mapbox.
